# Pull Request Template

## Description
Please include a summary of the changes you made and the related issue.  
Example: "Added my three assignment files (StudentID_gb.txt, StudentID_devops.txt, StudentID_sdlc.txt) and updated README with group details."

---

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [x] Documentation update
- [ ] Other

---

## Checklist
- [x] I have created at least 10 commits on my branch
- [x] My code/files follow the assignment guidelines
- [x] I have tested my changes
- [x] I have added necessary comments in my files
- [x] README.md and other documentation updated if needed
- [x] My branch is up to date with main branch before creating this PR

---

## Related Issue
Link any related issue or assignment task here (if applicable)
